Uses of Class
simplenlg.framework.WordElement

  • Packages that use WordElement 
    Package Description
    simplenlg.framework
    The framework package contains the base components required for running the SimpleNLG package.
    simplenlg.lexicon  
    simplenlg.lexicon.english  
    simplenlg.lexicon.spanish  
    simplenlg.morphology
    The morphology package contains the processing module that handles the morphology in the SimpleNLG package.
    simplenlg.morphology.english
    This package contains the necessary classes for running the morphology processor for the English language.
    simplenlg.morphology.spanish
